summary: Momoko, a strange and seemingly emotionless girl obsessed with 18th century France, befriends a Yanki biker and the two experience the ups and downs of their unusual lives in a rural Japanese town.
cast: Kyoko Fukada|Anna Tsuchiya|Hiroyuki Miyasako|Sadao Abe|Eiko Koike|Shin Yazawa|Hirotarô Honda|Kirin Kiki|Yoshiyoshi Arakawa|Katsuhisa Namase|Ryôko Shinohara|Yoshinori Okada|Kanako Irie|Haruo Mizuno|Yûichi Kimura|Yôko Maki|Ken Ayugai|Mayuko Fukuda|Vincent Giry|Takuji Kawakubo|Marie Machida|Akiko Mishiro|Laurence Midori Ohta|Atsuko Shikata
title: Kamikaze Girls
